title: Franchise value of the Cleveland Cavaliers ( NBA ) 2003 to 2020
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 18 data points.
In general Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, about 1510.0 was reported at Year 2020
The lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 222.0 was reported at Year 2003

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 18 data points.
Overall Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
